title: The Gentleman Bandit 1981 (Action, Drama film) Ralph Waite, Julie Bovasso, Jerry Zaks

sources.title: The Gentleman Bandit 1981 (Action, Drama film) Ralph Waite, Julie Bovasso, Jerry Zaks
sources.description:
Based on the real-life ordeal of Baltimore priest Bernard Pagano, who was fingered by a witness as a holdup man. During a lineup, several other witnesses confirm this.

Original title: The Gentleman Bandit (1981)


Director: Jonathan Kaplan
Writers: Milan Stitt, Lou Angeli
Stars: Ralph Waite, Julie Bovasso, Jerry Zaks
Genre: Drama, Biography


00:00 Full Color Movie (with subtitles). 
00:35 - A tense heist begins as Manny and his crew argue over cutting the red wire.
05:16 - Manny and Nicky rob a party, demanding jewelry and cash from terrified guests.
41:00 - Nicky reflects on his criminal past, vowing to make amends with Maria and Ally.
1:00:01 - Manny confronts Maria, revealing his jealousy and unresolved feelings for her.
1:10:00 - Nicky and Harry plan one last heist to secure their future and protect Maria.
1:20:00 - A dramatic showdown unfolds as Manny betrays Nicky during the heist.
1:25:29 - Manny is fatally shot by police, exposing his double life as a corrupt officer.
1:30:00 - Nicky bids farewell to Maria and Ally, promising to return as a better man.
